summary: Poverty reduction and social inclusion specialist with around 30 years of experience in development cooperation in the Asia Pacific, Africa and Latin American regions. My areas of focus are poverty reduction, social inclusion and gender with participatory development and human rights as cross-cutting approaches. Expertise in analysing, advising, designing and evaluating country strategies, programmes and policies in the above areas/themes and in Delivering as One UN-related processes.
